item.title: Re: Question on Ranking XP
item.content:encoded: If you're serious about a ranking run, and have stockpiled 500+ Smokebombs, then getting 150+ Missions is not hard at all thanks to Act in a Kage's Place (up to +1000 Stamina). Not to mention up to 1 000 000 RXP from parties.

item.title: Re: Question on Ranking XP
item.content:encoded: I've read that guide and understand how to get a lot of ranking, I just don't see how the numbers work out. Even with Annie/Mr. Tea/Strawberry as your team with Note Rush, I figure you would still need ~150 missions to get one million. Is there anyone that can give me actual numbers? I.e., this much xp from missions multiplied by this bonus, this much from parties, etc.
